Regular price $11.99 Sale price $9.99

Raindrops Conditioner Bar

Raindrops : Sugary & sweet blend of warm vanilla Spring rain

Our Conditioner bars are super concentrated and contain only luxurious, salon quality ingredients. Convenient, compact, and environmentally friendly, each bar will easily outlast three medium sized bottles of traditional conditioner! 

Benefits Include:

  • Luxurious Formula
  • No Large Plastic Bottle 
  • Perfect for Traveling (FDA Compliant) & Camping 
  • Animal Cruelty Free
  • pH Balanced 
  • Vegan Friendly 
  • Long Lasting 
  • Mother Nature Approved 
  • Suitable For ALL Hair Types 
  • Ensures Beautiful, Soft, & Shiny Hair

Directions: Rub directly on hair or between hands and apply.  Wait 2-3 minutes before rinsing.  

Ingredients: Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cocoa Butter, Cetyl Alcohol, Coconut Oil, Glycerine USP, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Wheat Germ Oil, Jojoba Oil, Fragrance/EO, Color (May contain: Charcoal Powder, Red#40 Lake, Brown Oxide, Chromium Hydroxide Green, Yellow #5 Lake, Yellow #6 Lake, Green #8, Green #5, Red #33, Violet #2, Genitian Violet)

Note: These bars do contain Vanilla Oil and may change colors in time. Safe to still use.

Dirty Bee | Body Oil

Montecito- Blend of Freesia, Floral , and Citrus. Best SELLER!

Body oil helps to lock moisture into your skin for hours. It penetrates your skin’s protective barrier and helps maintain a radiant glow throughout the day. To maximize the amount of moisture your skin retains, remember to cleanse and exfoliate your skin before you apply body oil. Let the oil to soak in for two - three minutes before getting dressed. This way your skin stays moisturized and your clothes stay grease free.

  • Actively helps fade stretch marks.
  • Helps Skin Retain Moisture.
  • By massaging your skin with body oils, you can help to improve your overall health by reducing aches and pains and decreasing stress.
  • Coconut Oil: provides deep moisture without making your skin oily.
  • Red Raspberry Seed Oil: A great source of antioxidants and vitamins A and E, red raspberry seed oil can slow the aging process, stimulate collagen production, and help your skin appear more youthful and vibrant.

Key Information about our Body Oils:

  • Travel Friendly
  • 100% Vegan
  • Animal Cruelty-Free
  • Reusable Container
  • Mother Nature Approved
  • Gluten Free

Ingredients: Fractionated Coconut Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Jojoba Oil, Red Raspberry Seed Oil, Baobab Oil, Fragrance

      • Jojoba oil- provides your skin with a restorative and cleansing effect that leaves a lasting glow. It is a noncomedogenic, meaning that it won’t clog your pores and prevent the regular release of sebaceous proteins that repair the damage to your skin.
      • Iron oxides- Naturally occurring minerals known to be safe, gentle and non-toxic on the surface of the skin.
